title: Spirit Planters - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Cultivation   Fanfiction   Female Protagonist   Unique Cultivation Technique
author: 终于动笔
description:
There are many professions in the world of self-cultivation. Among them, the most time-consuming and the most incompetent in wartime are Spirit Planters.

As the most sturdy profession once, the beauty of swordsmanship, after reshaping the body, she could only be a spiritualist, Luo Jingchen expressed her sadness.

But she is a smart person. Although she didn’t figure it out for a while, she finally made a smart choice.

As a spiritualist, planting flowers and raising grass is a must, and alchemy and pharmacy are auxiliary skills. As for fighting fiercely, it is not a personal hobby. She just tells others who has low combat power with facts.>
